name: Cactus With A Gun(Game jam Edition)
name_original: Cactus With A Gun(Game jam Edition)
description:
made for the 6th annual brackeys game jam, created in 3 days, with 2 friends behind me, and 1 big burnout.

your a cactus, with a gun. you fight enemies and shoot guns. that's it.

thx to Cozmos YT for making the sprite work go check out his youtube, it says i did all the sprite work bc it was like 1am when posting this and i totaly for got abt credit i was very tired plz dont get mad at me

this is only for html5 right now so sry if you clicked the leave button on the game over screen. i have the desktop versions ready so when the game jam is over i will post them on itch.io

i honestly tried my best and didnt want to make it as sloppy and buggy as it is now. i actually made this in 3 days because the first 4 days i wanted to do a kind of terrain generation game(sort of like terraria but bad). so trust me when i say i worked hard on this. thx!

-squid
